TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TotalsRowFormula extends DocumentFormat.OpenXml.Spreadsheet.TableFormulaType

Docs.summary: Totals Row Formula. When the object is serialized out as xml, its qualified name is x:totalsRowFormula.

remarks.format:
## Remarks [!INCLUDE[openxmlnoticeiso](~/includes/openxmlnoticeiso.md)] **totalsRowFormula (Totals Row Formula)** This element contains a custom formula for aggregating values from the column. Each tableColumn has a *totalsRowFunction* that can be used for simple aggregations such as average, standard deviation, min, max, count, and others. If a more custom calculation is desired, then this element should be used, and the *totalsRowFunction* shall be set to "*custom*". |Parent Elements| |---------------------| |tableColumn (§18.5.1.3)| |Attributes|Description| |----------------|-----------------| |array (Array)|A Boolean value that indicates whether this formula is an array style formula.

The possible values for this attribute are defined by the W3C XML Schema *boolean* datatype.| [*Note*: The W3C XML Schema definition of this element’s content model (CT_TableFormula) is located in §A.2. *end note*] [!INCLUDE[openxmlnoticeiso](~/includes/openxmlcopyrightiso.md)]
